title: Gravity Intro (Beginner)
intro: Gravity is like a giant magnet that pulls things towards each other. It keeps us on the ground and makes objects fall when we let go of them.
outro: Well done! You've got the hang of the basic idea of gravity in a simple way.

concepts.name: Gravity Basics
concepts.explain: Imagine gravity as a giant magnet that pulls objects down, holding us on the ground. It causes things to drop when we release them, like how apples fall from trees.
concepts.example: Think of a ball rolling down a hill. Gravity is like a gentle force guiding the ball downward.

check.question: Can you explain gravity using a magnet as an analogy?
